long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebStash is the ultimate solution for organizing and keeping track of all those important links you stumble upon throughout the day. With WebStash, you can easily save your current tab with a short description and up to 3 relevant tags, ensuring that nothing gets lost in the sea of open tabs or bookmarks.

Whether it's an insightful article, an interesting video, or a work-related resource, it helps you categorize, label, and add meaningful descriptions to each link you save. Plus, for those who need to stay organized across platforms, WebStash allows you to export your entire list of saved links to a downloadable Excel file.

—designed to simplify your digital life, one link at a time.

Key Features:
Save any open tab with a custom title, description, and up to 3 tags.
Organize your links with tags for easy reference.
Export all saved links to an Excel file with just one click.
Lightweight and easy-to-use interface, designed to minimize clutter and maximize productivity.Whether you're a researcher, a content creator, or just someone who has too many tabs open at once, WebStash is here to help you stay on top of it all.
